posts.message:
i have a question regarding Angular 2, i was digging about using 3rd parties libs into angular 2 apps and i found that i can either include a script tag then declare the main object as a global, or look for a typing to this particular lib.

both ways works fine, but my question is which is a best practice ?! i think the answer is to look for a typed version but what i have noticed is that the typed version doesn't include all the lib features ( based on certain libs i need to use ), so again is the script tag bad practice ?

Edit: what i mentioned about script tag in the index.html file and also include installing the lib via npm and import it angular-cli.json [scripts]

I know this question is slightly out of topic but has anyone noticed that although there is a shortage in developers in general here in Egypt, there is a major shortage in UI, php devs, and I am starting to notice a huge shortage in iOS devs?

Hi guys 
recently i went to interviews as android developer. I noticed something, so i want to ask this.

What are the skills -apart from the technical skills- that a 3 years of exp developer/software eng should have?  or more like a generic tech-skills that is not android/ios/?? related.
Is there any way to use skype via mobile data not Wi-Fi?

شباب.. لو عايز أتعلم Powershell أبدأ منين وكدة؟ 
حاضر هـGoogle it بس بعد مااسمع كلامكم وخبراتكم :D 
وشكرًا

لو حد بيدور انه يعمل Integration بين ASP.NET Core و  SPA  كـ Client Side في بروجكت واحد الGenerator ده تقدر تبني عليه البروجكت بتاعك 

https://github.com/aspnet/JavaScriptServices

posts.message:
Hi...I really needs a help please
First of all I was going to install win8.1 instead of win10 so I inserted the DVD and formatted the C partition but few minutes later the installation stopped and gave me an error so used minitool partitioning trying to fix.then found that setting partitions in active mode isn't available''not exist not''exists but hidden''  ''...so formatted C again and deleted it and created it again but didn't find the setting active option again. ..so restarted the laptop and found this!!! Putting the installation DVD or the minitool cd and getting nothing but this! !so please help it's full with very important data. ..please please help!
